1101110011101100 1011101111101010 0 -> sum: 1001100011010110, cout: 1
0010011010001010 0110111100011110 0 -> sum: 1001010110101000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
